meta.title: An Overview of the Hayu Region

nodes.body: The Hayu are an ethnic group of Nepal who speak a Tibeto-Burman language of the same name. According to the 2001 census of Nepal, 1,743 people speak Hayu as a mother tongue and there are 1,821 ethnic Hayu. (Mark Turin â€“ June 01, 2004)
